source:
%%sql
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS etlhubConfirmed.opportunity_business_partner_daily_ft (
    BUSINESS_PARTNER_FACT_KEY INT NOT NULL,	
    BUSINESS_PARTNER_FACT_VERSION INT ,	
    OPPORTUNITY_KEY INT,
    BUSINESS_PARTNER_KEY INT,
	INFLUENCER_ROLE_CODE varchar(10) ,
	CURRENT_IND varchar(1)  ,
	EXTRACT_DT TIMESTAMP ,
	REC_START_DT TIMESTAMP ,
	REC_END_DT TIMESTAMP ,
	SOURCE_SYSTEM varchar(50)  ,
	REC_CHECKSUM varchar(32)  ,
	REC_STATUS varchar(1)  ,
	IMG_LST_UPD_DT TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
	IMG_CREATED_DT TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
	DATA_IND varchar(10)  ,
	ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND char(1)  
)
USING DELTA
PARTITIONED BY (CURRENT_IND)
-- specify data lake folder location
LOCATION 'abfss://deltalake@adls4fsoetlhubdevuseast.dfs.core.windows.net/data/BUSINESS_PARTNER_DAILY_FT'

%%sql
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS etlhubConfirmed.BUSINESS_PARTNER  (
BUSINESS_PARTNER_KEY INT NOT NULL , 
BUSINESS_PARTNER_VERSION INT NOT NULL , 
BUSINESS_PARTNER_ID VARCHAR(30), 
BUS_PARTNER_NM VARCHAR(50), 
AGR_BUS_PARTNER_ID VARCHAR(30), 
AGR_BUS_PARTNER_NM VARCHAR(50), 
CURRENT_IND VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL , 
EXTRACT_DT TIMESTAMP, 
REC_START_DT TIMESTAMP, 
REC_END_DT TIMESTAMP, 
SOURCE_SYSTEM VARCHAR(50), 
REC_CHECKSUM VARCHAR(32), 
REC_STATUS VARCHAR(1), 
IMG_LST_UPD_DT TIMESTAMP , 
IMG_CREATED_DT TIMESTAMP )  
USING DELTA
PARTITIONED BY (CURRENT_IND)
-- specify data lake folder location
LOCATION 'abfss://deltalake@adls4fsoetlhubdevuseast.dfs.core.windows.net/data/Business_Partner'

%%sql
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS etlhubConfirmed.opportunity(
OPPORTUNITY_KEY INTEGER NOT NULL , 
OPPORTUNITY_VERSION INT NOT NULL, 
OPPORTUNITY_NUM varchar(50), 
CURRENT_IND varchar(1), 
EXTRACT_DT TIMESTAMP, 
REC_START_DT TIMESTAMP, 
REC_END_DT TIMESTAMP, 
SOURCE_SYSTEM varchar(50), 
REC_CHECKSUM varchar(32), 
REC_STATUS varchar(1), 
IMG_LST_UPD_DT TIMESTAMP, 
IMG_CREATED_DT TIMESTAMP, 
ISA_CODE varchar(10), 
ARCH_REASON_CD varchar(20), 
BUSINESS_TRANSACTION_TYPE varchar(1), 
CLIENT_REPRESENTATIVE_NAME varchar(100), 
COMPETITOR_LIST varchar(100), 
IDENTIFIER_USER_NAME varchar(100), 
OPPORTUNITY_NAME varchar(100), 
OPPORTUNITY_SOURCE_CD varchar(20), 
SBS_SOL_VALID_IND varchar(1) , 
OPPORTUNITY_IDENTIFIER varchar(100) , 
ROGUE_IND varchar(1), 
REASON_TO_ACT varchar(255) , 
SOLUTION_CATG varchar(1024) , 
BRAND_SPONSOR_LIST varchar(500) , 
GBS_GEOGRAPHY_NAME varchar(60), 
GBS_BUSINESS_UNIT_GROUP_NAME varchar(60) , 
GBS_BUSINESS_UNIT_NAME varchar(60) , 
TAG_LIST varchar(1000) , 
OPPORTUNITY_LEGACY_NO varchar(100) )
USING DELTA
PARTITIONED BY (CURRENT_IND)
-- specify data lake folder location
LOCATION 'abfss://deltalake@adls4fsoetlhubdevuseast.dfs.core.windows.net/data/OPPORTUNITY'

%%sql
ALTER TABLE etlhubConfirmed.opportunity ADD COLUMN ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND char(1)
	--ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND char(1)
